mapper.delete: delete from friend where userId = #{userId} and friendId = #{friendId}
mapper.select: select friendId from friend where userId = #{userId}
select chatUser.name from chatUser inner join friend on chatUser.id = friend.friendId where id in(select friendId from friend where userId =#{userId});

select chatUser.id, chatUser.name, chatUser.image from chatUser inner join friend on chatUser.id = friend.friendId where id in(select friendId from friend where userId =#{userId}) order by chatUser.name asc;
